mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, product_contents, product_category, product_rate, product_sale) VALUES (#{productName} , #{productContents} , #{productCategory} , #{productRate} , #{productSale})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_category = #{productCategory}, product_rate = #{productRate}, product_contents = #{productContents}, product_sale = #{productSale} WHERE product_num = #{productNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(board_num) FROM comment WHERE product_num=#{productNum}
